snippet: About one in five people in Jordan is a refugee. Most live in communities outside camps where they depend on help from the U.N. — and their neighbors.
lead_paragraph: About one in five people in Jordan is a refugee. Most live in communities outside camps where they depend on help from the U.N. — and their neighbors.
